title: Tahhiyatul Masjid in Masjid Al Haram? | Sheikh Assim Al Hakeem
transcript: do we have to offer the hated Masjid when we enter al Haram and Masjid al-haram the answer is yes it is a message it like any other message it you must not sit down in any Masjid that is full-fledged Masjid without praying two Rakas so he may ask britannia's and says okay but I heard that the Tawaf is that the hey it will miss you and this is not true if you want to offer seven rounds of toe off as voluntary good for you but still before you sit down you have to pray 2 rakats
